attributes.action: Make Fri 25th-Mon 28th June a National Bank Holiday to mark the end of Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone in the country has been affected in some way by Covid 19 and the necessary lockdown measures, whether it be losing a loved one, their business, their home or their sanity, it has been a big strain on us all and the economy. 
We feel it is only fair to be able to enjoy life going back to normal by purposely promoting reconnection between people, a long weekend would enable us to have the well needed extra time to make up for lost connections with our loved ones.
attributes.background:
The UK Lockdown has affected & separated everyone from each other for over a year, we feel the Government should allow us a one off long weekend to enjoy the end of lockdown & being able to reunite with family and friends. 
Possibility of planned street parties during this period?

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Create UK Bank Holidays on 25th and 28th June 2021 in lieu of Christmas 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564183

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
